original: Klinton, Hilmer August, id. fisk-hamnsdirektör, Billdal, f. 30/10/79 i Gbg. G. 11 m. Ebba Johnsson. Barn: Bertil f. 12, Gösta 15, Inga 17, Karin 18, Gunnar 21. — Lärov:stud., st3T-m:ex. 98, sjökapt:ex. 00. Stud :res. t. olika hamnar i Engl. o. på kontin. 28, besökt hamnar i Nord- o. Sydamer., Ostind., Medelhav, o. flera europ. länder. Und:Iöjtn. i flottans res. 01, löjtn. 08. Prakt, på sv. o. eng. segelfartyg 94-97 o. 98-99, styrman o. be-fälh. i Rederi A-B Sv. Lloyd 02-14, hamnfogde i Gbg 14-17, fiskhamnsdir. där 17-44. Led. av o. fd. ordf. i Gbgs fartygsbefälh. fören., led. av o. fd. styr:suppl. i Sjökapt. i Gbg pens :kas-sa, en av stift, av samt styr:led. o. mångårig sekr, i Gamla Majpojkars förb. Medl. av Naut. fören., Sjöman-nasäli.sk., Gbgs stads tj :mannaförb, o. Odd Fellow. Skr.: Gbgs stads fiskhamn 1910-35 (festskr. 35), Utdrar:- nr Gbgs fartygsbefälh. skeppisdagb. Hob-bies: segling, marin- o. porträttmålning. RVO.
translated: Klinton, Hilmer August, id. fish harbor director, Billdal, b. 30/10/79 in Gbg (Gothenburg). Married 11 times to Ebba Johnsson. Children: Bertil b. 12, Gösta b. 15, Inga b. 17, Karin b. 18, Gunnar b. 21. Education: studied at the university, maritime exam 98, ship captain exam 00. Studied abroad in various ports in England and on the continent in 28, visited ports in North and South America, East Indies, Mediterranean, and several European countries. Lieutenant in the navy reserves 01, lieutenant 08. Practical experience on Swedish and English sailing ships 94-97 and 98-99, mate and officer in Rederi AB Sv. Lloyd 02-14, harbor master in Gbg 14-17, fish harbor director there 17-44. Member of and former chairman of the Gbg ship officer association, member of and former substitute board member in the Maritime Captaincy in Gbg pension fund, one of the founders and board members and longtime secretary of the Old May Boys Association. Member of the Nautical Association, Seamen's Home Association, Gbg city official's association, and Odd Fellow. Writings: Gbg city fish harbor 1910-35 (commemorative book 35). Interests: sailing, maritime and portrait painting. Recipient of the Order of the Vasa.

structured.name: Hilmer August Klinton

memberOf.name: Maritime Captaincy in Gbg Pension Fund

structured.description: Hilmer August Klinton was a Swedish Fish Harbor Director.
